about_the_game:
Latest updates and Item Chests (DLC) are currently available for Windows.

The clock is ticking... How far will you get?


Welcome to Sky Is Arrows, where every second matters. In this intricate fantasy world, heroes rise and fall under the shadow of relentless challenges, escalating difficulty, and the ever-present threat of permanent death. The stakes grow higher the longer you play—time is your greatest enemy, and hesitation can be fatal.

Adapt or perish as the game steadily ramps up the intensity. Strengthen your hero and marshal your armies to safeguard your castle and overcome relentless foes. But survival demands more than brute strength—you’ll need to master the art of quick decision-making as you collect and choose from a wide array of items. Will you focus on stacking powerful effects to amplify your hero’s abilities or hunt down rare, game-changing treasures to turn the tide in your favor?

Venture into the unknown, exploring ancient graveyards, mysterious shrines, and treasure-filled chests. Every Act presents new, unpredictable challenges and opportunities, ensuring no two adventures are alike. Discover, adapt, and evolve your strategy to outpace the ever-ticking clock.

As your hero progresses, you’ll grow stronger with each choice you make. Strategically allocate skill points to develop devastating physical power or uncover the secrets of a spell’s ultimate potential.

Beware the rising storm: the game grows harder with each passing moment. The enemies evolve, their armies swell, and the final boss looms ever closer. Can you craft an unstoppable hero, conquer all who stand in your way, and claim victory before the world crushes you?

             

Pick your item, quick!


In Sky Is Arrows, item chests contain 1-3 randomly distributed items for you to choose from. Most items can be stacked up to 30 times, amplifying their effects, while others are rare and one-of-a-kind or exclusive to certain maps and DLCs. Planning your hero and army build is key—but you’ll also need to adapt to the randomness of the items presented.

Quick decisions are vital: as you master the items and their possibilities, you’ll make faster choices. However, for new adventurers, hesitation can be the downfall of many heroes. Contemplating too long will cause the game to escalate in difficulty—so think fast or face the consequences!

There are 73 items total: 41 Core + 6 Dragon Bracer + 20 Celestial Bow + 6 Ebonhare Visage.

             

Important Notice


As of January 1st, 2025, Sky Is Arrows has transitioned from a free-to-play model to a one-time purchase price of $14.99 paired with lower DLC prices. Existing players who downloaded the game before this date will retain access without additional charges. New players are invited to join the adventure at the current price.
